Title: Establishes a legislative commission on the future of the Long Island Power Authority
Summary: Establishes an eight member legislative commission on the future of the Long Island Power Authority to investigate and evaluate the establishment of a public power model for the operation of LIPA, whereby the authority would directly operate the utility as a true public power authority; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to establishing a legislative commission on the future of the Long Island Power Authority
